name: LibreVPN
description: LibreVPN is a younger brother of ShareVPN with 100+ initial servers running  Servers Our servers came from random donators & from our own pockets  Privacy & Security LibreVPN servers & payloads configurations were encrypted with OpenSSL to protect users privacy & security  Services We are offering free services to everyone  Rules Torrenting is not allowed on not torrent servers  Illegal activities activities such as child porn, carding, DDOS, hacking, and other illegal stuffs are not allowed.  Ratings Please rate us wholeheartedly   Learn more at https://sharevpn.org/get-started  Like us at https://www.facebook.com/librevpn  Join our FB group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/sharehub Need Help sharehubcommunity@gmail.com
